impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FO - Fine
Fined £500.00, ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
FIDICTI - Fined and detained in default of payment until time
To be detained in courthouse until 10:00. Total amount enforced £40.00.
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 20/04/2027.
impositionOffenceDetails.title: Permit use of motor vehicle - driver not having proper control - endorsable offence
